title: NatWest shares fall 4% after $3.7 billion deal to buy one of UK's largest wealth managers
summary_full: NatWest's shares slid Monday after the company announced a £2.7 billion ($3.7 billion) deal to acquire one of the U.K.'s largest wealth managers.
summary_public: NatWest's shares slid Monday after the company announced a £2.7 billion ($3.7 billion) deal to acquire one of the U.K.'s largest wealth managers.

GB.label: neutral
GB.evidence: one of UK's largest wealth managers
